KotET OVERLORDS OF CHAOS (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Chaos - Slaves to Darkness) [2,000pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Hunters of the Heartlands

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Expert Underdogs, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Hunters of the Heartlands


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Expert Underdogs Units from this battalion cannot be picked when your opponent carries out a monstrous rampage.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Hunters of the Heartlands 2-3 Troops

      • EXPERT - Slaves to Darkness Core Battalion: Overlords of Chaos

        Magnificent es un ERROR

        Selections: Magnificent

        Categories: Core Battalion, Battalion, STD Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Overlords of Chaos


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Overlords of Chaos 3-6 Varanguard

    • Leader [1,120pts]

      • Batallon OVERLORDS OF CHAOS - Varanguard [280pts]

        EXPERT

        Selections: 1. Flask of Daemonblood, 3 Varanguard, 3. Wall of Cursed Iron, 3x Daemonforged Blade, General, Slaanesh, Tearing Fangs, Warpsteel Shields

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, Other, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, MARK OF CHAOS, EVERCHOSEN, VARANGUARD, Leader, General, Slaanesh General, SLAANESH, Artefact

        Artefact: Flask of Daemonblood, Command Trait: Wall of Cursed Iron, Unit: Varanguard, Unit Abilities: Daemonforged Blade, Elite, Favoured of the Everchosen, Relentless Killers, Warpsteel Shield, Weapon: Daemonforged Blade, Tearing Fangs


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Flask of Daemonblood In your hero phase, you can roll a dice for the unit bearing this artefact. If you do so, on a 4+ you can heal D3 wounds allocated to that unit.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Wall of Cursed Iron When friendly KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE units wholly within 12" of this general use their Warpsteel Shields ability, add 1 to the roll.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Varanguard 10"593+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Daemonforged Blade If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Daemonforged Blade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Elite Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.
        Favoured of the Everchosen Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by this unit (excluding those of its mounts) if ARCHAON is in your army and on the battlefield.
        Relentless Killers Once per battle, in the combat phase, after this unit has fought in that phase for the first time, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight, this unit can be picked to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units.
        Warpsteel Shield Each time this unit is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on this unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Daemonforged Blade Melee1"33+3+-1D3
        Tearing Fangs Melee1"34+3+-1

    • Battleline [825pts]

      • Chaos Chariots [315pts]

        Selections: 3 Chaos Chariots, Chaos War-flail, Lashing Whip, 2x Reinforced [210pts], Slaanesh, Trampling Hooves

        Categories: CHAOS CHARIOTS, CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, Battleline, Reinforced, SLAANESH

        Unit: Chaos Chariot, Unit Abilities: Don't Spare the Lash, Exalted Charioteer, Swift Death, Weapon: Chaos War-flail, Lashing Whip, Trampling Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Chariot 12"764+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Don't Spare the Lash Once per battle, this unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Exalted Charioteer If this unit has 2 or more models, 1 model in this unit can be an Exalted Charioteer. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with that model’s melee weapons (excluding those of its mount).
        Swift Death After this unit makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the charge roll for that charge move. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Chaos War-flail Melee2"D64+3+-1
        Lashing Whip Melee2"24+4+-1
        Trampling Hooves Melee1"44+4+-1

      • Chaos Knights [170pts]

        Selections: 5 Chaos Knights [170pts], Chaos Runeshields, Cursed Flail for Doom Knight, Cursed Lance, Hornblower, Hunters of the Heartlands - 2-3 Troops, Slaanesh, Standard Bearer, Trampling Hooves

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS KNIGHTS, Battleline, SLAANESH

        Unit: Chaos Knights, Unit Abilities: Chaos Runeshield, Doom Knight, Hornblower, Impaling Charge, Standard Bearer, Terrifying Champions, Weapon: Cursed Flail, Cursed Lance, Trampling Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Knights 10"374+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to a unit with Chaos Runeshields. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.
        Doom Knight 1 model in this unit can be a Doom Knight. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic that model’s melee weapons (excluding its mount). In addition, that model can replace its weapon option with a Cursed Flail and Chaos Runeshield.
        Hornblower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for a unit that includes any Hornblowers.
        Impaling Charge Add 1 to the Damage characteristic and improve the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Cursed Lances by 2 if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.
        Terrifying Champions Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units within 3" of any friendly units with this ability in the battleshock phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Cursed Flail Melee2"D64+3+-1
        Cursed Lance Melee1"24+3+-1
        Trampling Hooves Melee1"24+4+-1

      • Chaos Knights [170pts]

    • Other [55pts]

      • Chaos Spawn [55pts]

        Selections: Freakish Mutations, Slaanesh

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS SPAWN, MARK OF CHAOS, Other, SLAANESH

        Unit: Chaos Spawn, Unit Abilities: Writhing Tentacles, Weapon: Freakish Mutations


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Spawn 2D6"5105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Writhing Tentacles If you roll a double when determining the number of attacks made by Freakish Mutations, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by the attacking model until the end of the phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Freakish Mutations Melee1"2D64+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Slaves to Darkness

          Selections: Knights of the Empty Throne

          Categories: Wrath of the Everchosen

          Aura of Chaos Power: Aura of Chaos Undivided, Aura of Khorne, Aura of Nurgle, Aura of Slaanesh, Aura of Tzeentch, Battle Trait: Aura of Chaos, Eye of the Gods, Fists of the Everchosen, Command Abilities: Failure is Not an Option, Unmatched Conquerors, Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll: 02 - Spawndom, 03 - Slaughterer's Strength, 04 - Murderous Mutation, 05 - Iron Flesh, 06 - Flames of Chaos, 07 - Snubbed by the Gods, 08 - Unholy Resilience, 09-10 - Daemonic Legions, 11-12 - Dark Apotheosis


        Aura of Chaos Power Ability Ref
        Aura of Chaos Undivided Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED unit wholly within 12" of this model. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Aura of Khorne You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Nurgle If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE unit wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability is 6, add 1 to the damage inflicted by that attack. In addition, if this model is a general, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Slaanesh If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH unit wholly within 12" of this model is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. In addition, if this model is a general, you can re-roll run and charge rolls for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Tzeentch You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, each time a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH unit wholly within 12" of this model is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Aura of Chaos If a SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO has a Mark of Chaos keyword, that HERO has one of the following Aura of Chaos abilities. The Aura of Chaos a HERO has is determined by its Mark of Chaos keyword: KHORNE HEROES have the Aura of Khorne, TZEENTCH HEROES have the Aura of Tzeentch, NURGLE HEROES have the Aura of Nurgle, SLAANESH HEROES have the Aura of Slaanesh, and UNDIVIDED HEROES have the Aura of Chaos Undivided.

        If you select a unit with more than one Mark of Chaos keyword to be part of your army, you must pick which one will apply to that unit for the duration of the battle.
        Eye of the Gods At the end of the combat phase, if any attacks made by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO that has the EYE OF THE GODS keyword destroyed any enemy HEROES or MONSTERS in that phase, you can make 1 roll on the Eye of the Gods table below for that friendly HERO.

        Rewards gained by rolling on this table apply for the rest of the battle. Duplicate rewards are treated as ‘Snubbed by the Gods’ instead
        Fists of the Everchosen If you have given your army the KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE keyword, friendly KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE VARANGUARD units gain the HERO keyword if ARCHAON is not part of your army.

        A KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE VARANGUARD unit with the HERO keyword can only have the command traits or artefacts listed opposite.

        The Look Out, Sir! rule does not apply to KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE VARANGUARD units with the HERO keyword.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Failure is Not an Option You can use this command ability when a friendly KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE VARANGUARD unit is destroyed. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 5+ a new KNIGHT OF THE EMPTY THRONE VARANGUARD unit of 3 models is added to your army. Set up the new unit wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" away from enemy units. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.
        Unmatched Conquerors You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, pick 1 enemy unit that controls an objective and is within 12" of a friendly KNIGHTS OF THE EMPTY THRONE HERO. Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit. For each 3+, until the end of the battle round, the number of models in that unit that are counted when determining control of that objective is reduced by 1. The same unit cannot be affected by this command ability more than once per turn.
        Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll Reward Ref
        02 - Spawndom You can add 1 SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN to your army. If you do so, set up 1 SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN model within 1" of this HERO, then this HERO is slain. If you do not add a SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN to your army, this HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        03 - Slaughterer's Strength Pick 1 of this HERO’s melee weapons. Improve the Rend characteristic of that weapon by 1.
        04 - Murderous Mutation Pick 1 of this HERO’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon.
        05 - Iron Flesh Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this HERO.
        06 - Flames of Chaos Each time this HERO is affected by a spell or endless spell you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on this HERO.
        07 - Snubbed by the Gods This reward has no effect.
        08 - Unholy Resilience Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this HERO. On a 5+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        09-10 - Daemonic Legions You can add 1 of the following units to your army. The unit you add is determined by this HERO’s Mark of Chaos. Set up the unit wholly within 12" of this HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        • Khorne: 10 Bloodletters
        • Nurgle: 10 Plaguebearers
        • Slaanesh: 10 Daemonettes
        • Tzeentch: 10 Pink Horrors
        • Undivided: 6 Furies
        11-12 - Dark Apotheosis You can add a SLAVES TO DARKNESS DAEMON PRINCE to your army. If you do so, set it up within 1" of this HERO then remove this HERO from play (they do not count as slain).

        If the HERO had the UNDIVIDED keyword, the DAEMON PRINCE must instead have one of the following Mark of Chaos keywords: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH or TZEENTCH. Otherwise, the DAEMON PRINCE must have the same Mark of Chaos keyword that the HERO had.

        The DAEMON PRINCE keeps any command traits and artefacts of power that the HERO had. If the HERO was a WIZARD, the DAEMON PRINCE is a WIZARD, can make the same number of casting, dispelling and unbinding attempts, and knows the same spells. If the HERO was your general, the DAEMON PRINCE is now your general.

        If you do not set up a SLAVES TO DARKNESS DAEMON PRINCE, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this HERO.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Dominating Presence

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Dominating Presence


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Dominating Presence When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there is at least 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within each large quarter of the battlefield.
